item.title: Project-specific servers
item.description: Deprecated feature documented here to provide information about how to access existing instances. Project-specific servers are no longer provided on request, as most use cases can be satisfied by a tenancy in the JASMIN cloud.

item.title: Migrate a JASMIN account from CEDA
item.description: The information in this article should no longer apply to the majority of JASMIN users whose accounts were created since 2017.

item.title: JASMIN external connections
item.description: NOTE [January 2021] This article is now out of date. Some terminology, names and components are no longer current. A newer version will be posted here in due course.
